body.name: 14 Inch Queen Size Bed Frame with Mattress Slide Stopper - Double Black Basic Anti Squeak Steel Slats Metal Platform, Heavy Duty Noise Free Easy Assembly Bedframes, No Box Spring Needed
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs
features: IDEAL SIZE DESIGN - The size of the queen bed frame: 59.5" x 79.5", Suitable Mattress: 60" x 80". Maximum weight capacity of this queen size bed frame: 3500 lbs. There is 12.4 inches from the floor, which provides enough space for storing boxes, clothes, toys, quilts, etc.

NOISE ELIMINATION - No Box spring needed for the queen bed frame platform. Rubber cushion of the queen platform bed frame is good for noise elimination, Every bed legs designed with anti-scratch gaskets to protect your fancy floor and provides you with a peaceful sleep. The black queen bed is completely simple style. This queen metal bed frame is the prefect choice for residence bedroom, guest rooms, dormitories, apartments and short visiting families or friends.

MATTRESS NON SLIP GASKETS PREPARED - Anti slip mattress gripper is made of high-quality plastic. The mattress holder for bed frame is sturdy and resistant to deformation, providing an extra secure connection to prevent the mattress from slipping and keep mattress in place.

STURDY MATERIAL - Because we have chosen the high-quality materials, this metal queen bed frame is quite durable and solid. Unlike other beds, this queen bed frame no box spring needed has 9 thicken legs, which has the extra strong support. We believe once you get this bed queen frame, you will like it.

EASY ASSEMBLE - Easy to assemble queen bed frame for box spring and mattress, with clear step-by-step instructions to help you easily assemble. The platform queen bed frame is placed in a box. All parts of queen storage bed frame are labeled clearly, which is easy to assemble, and can be assembled by one person within 20 minutes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid, silent, and well built
reviews.reviewText: Solid as a rock. The rubber feet are perfect for a waxed wood floor. the bed doesn't slide , but it also not so sticky that is easily moved if you need to slide it. No marks on the floor either after sliding.Built like a tank..and doesn't make any noise. I was going to lay down a layer of plywood in between the memory foam mattress and the frame but that was a mistake--the plywood slides around! The frame is built for memory foam mattresses. No sharp corners to stub toes on. 4 plastic mattress guides snapped snugly onto the frame to keep the mattress firmly aligned on the frame. Not that it would slide much anyway.Assembly was a bit grinding. Difficult to get everything out of the box without a helper. Very well packed with dozens of foam pad inserts to make sure nothing is scratched during shipping. Once out, everything sorted out nicely according to lettered labeling. Directions are fairly simple.. to the point where everything is shown by simple diagrams with 4 or 5 steps. An allen wrench and a small steel wrench are provided. You may need a rubber/ wood mallet or 2xx4 block with a regular hammer to tap things into place at one step, so allen bolts can thread. It was tedious turning at least 14 allen screws with the provided allen L wrench, but no big deal.All and all though, rock solid product. Whoeever made and designed this thing was definitely on the ball! If you're looking for a good solid mattress frame without a box spring, that is rock solid and quiet, this thing is what you need!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a well engineered product and excellent value!
reviews.reviewText: When you first open the shipping container, it is a bit overwhelming to see so many parts. However, all parts were nicely labelled and the instruction sheet has excellent drawings leading to a step by step easy assembly. Once assembled, it is an excellent bed frame. Steve Ellis, 2618 Wetherington Ln, Unit 226, Wooster, Ohio 44691 ... attention Lilian

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bed frame!
reviews.reviewText: I don’t usually write reviews, but I was so hesitant to buy this online and then was so impressed that I wanted to write one. We got my daughter a new mattress that did not need a box spring. This was the first time purchasing a frame like this without the need for a box spring. I was nervous it would be cheaply made, noisy and uncomfortable. I’m happy to say I was wrong! The packaging was great and it was easy to put together. The frame is sturdy and quiet and I love the extra space it gives you underneath. If you are looking fine this type of frame but unsure, this is a great one to go with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really doesn’t creak
reviews.reviewText: I looked for a bed that wouldn’t creak, and so far so good. My son jumps on the bed and I get worried it won’t remain silent for long but it seems to be holding up pretty well. I got the queen, and put a foam mattress on it and it seems fine.As for assembly, I did it by myself, you’ll need a screw driver, I have one with interchangeable heads. It was simple enough though there are a lot of parts. It looked more daunting than it actually was.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: easy to setup and very sturdy but If your looking for some pushin dam thing creaks loud and can wake the neighbors

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy, well built bed frame, I was very surprised with the quality, very simple, easy to assemble, I assembled the frame 15-20 minutes, once assembled the frame is solid and does not shift. I would highly recommend this frame. Purchased for memory foam mattress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect. We’ve had it for a couple months now and it is still just as sturdy as it was brand new out of the box. Easy to put together and not noisy. Definitely worth the buy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was originally very scared of swapping to this frame due to past experiences with metal bed frames. I was very surprised and happy to see that not only is this frame sturdy, but it makes absolutely no sounds! I am not a smaller person so was skeptical about the advertised weight limits, but I am so glad i made this purchase. It does not shift, squeak, or have any give in the slats. Thank you for making an awesome product! The only addition I have is a piece of plywood between the mattress and the frame to prevent mattress sagging.
